text: Konrad Grilc (born 25 October 1909, date of death unknown) was a Slovenian gymnast. He competed at the 1936 Summer Olympics and the 1948 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1909 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Slovenian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Yugoslavia Category:Gymnasts at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Gymnasts at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Celje
title: Konrad Grilc
